entry.title: Init
entry.content:
This is, more or less, an initial post so that my blog isn’t completely empty when I pushed it up.

I’ll be expanding on some of these in later days, but here’s a small set of what I’ve been playing around with lately.

  • React
    • Check out my brother’s excellent React-only-powered grid component, Griddle. I’ve been able to toss in a few push requests, so that’s been fun.
  • Atom, which has gotten considerably better since the initial release.
    • And what’s this? Atom is going to be moving some of its render to React?
  • Angular + Cordova

Excitement!
